name: VOID DRIVE
description:
Created for the #LowRezJam, released on April 17th. It features a fully-voiced game with driving music. It was inspired by games like Gradius and R-type from the NES and SNES days. The full story will be added later, we were unable to fully finish the sound editing by the deadline.

Controls/Notes:

Spacebar - Enter/Shoot

W/A/S/D - Move the Ship

There are two kinds of loot drops: powerups and repairs.

Credits:

A Sun Blossom Studios Game

Created by Brittany & Joseph Portner

Director voiced by Julie Liu

Pilot voiced by Connor Ludovice
